subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The loss was especially crushing as the Yankees’ squandered a hard-earned lead in the 10th inning when closer Andrew Miller, who had converted his first 24 save opportunities of the season, faltered.
snippet: The loss was especially crushing as the Yankees’ squandered a hard-earned lead in the 10th inning when closer Andrew Miller, who had converted his first 24 save opportunities of the season, faltered.
